SA15n1266:8: evaṃ tarhi avyavahāre svavacanavirodha iti cet-tat kiṃ svavacanavirodhenateṣupramāṇamupadarśi-(2)
SA15n1266:10: aprāmāṇiko vyavahāro'vaśyaṃ svīkarttavya iti vā bhavet |
SA15n1266:12: -he vā śaśaśṛṅge vā pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ vā upadarśayituṃ śakyaṃ tathātve vā kṛtaṃ bhautakalahena |
SA15n1266:14: avacanameva tarhi prāptaṃ kiṃ kurmo yatra vaca-(4)
SA15n1266:17: niṣprāmāṇike'rthe mūkavāvadūkayoḥ kataraḥ śreyān pramāṇika iti |
SA15n1266:19: sthitaṃ apitu vyavahāraḥ pratiṣiddha evāsatīti cet satyaṃ-yathā aprāmāṇikaḥ svavacanaviruddho'rtho mā prasāṅkṣīditi manyamānena tvayi yo'prāmāṇika-(6)
SA15n1266:20: -evāsati vyavahāraḥ svīkṛtastathāsmābhirapi pramāṇacintāyā aprāmāṇiko vyavahāro mā prasāṅkṣīditi manyamānairaprāmāṇika eva svavacanavi-(7)
SA15n1266:22: yadi tūbhayatrāpi bhavānsamānadṛṣṭiḥ syādasmābhirapi tadā na kiñciducyata iti |
SA15n1266:31: madukteṣu praśnādiṣu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti svayameva svīkārāt anuttare tu aprati bhaiveti |
SA15n1266:32: yadi ca vyavahārasvīkāre virodhaparihāraḥ syāt asau svīkriyetāpi na tvevaṃ-na khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanañca tanniṣedhabhājanaṃ veti parasparamavirodhi(tam(2) cet)
SA15n1266:34: iti pareṇoktaṃ tadetatsakalamasaṅgatam-svavāgvādhābodhanayā hi vyāpakānupalambhāśrayādyasiddhimudbhāvayato'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ utthāpyate |
SA15n1266:39: patteriti svābhiprāyeṇa upapattiḥ pratipāditā tathā cāśraye'vaṣṭambhakapratipanne pramāṇena pramāṇāpravṛttilakṣaṇadharmasya dharmidharmmatvāvarodhe ca niṣpa-(5)
SA15n1266:41: atha nāstyeva asiddhyādidoṣa parapramāṇasyāpyasiddhayā sādhanādau na sannidhānaṃ labdhavyamityāpātam |
SA15n1266:44: tataśca yattvayādūṣaṇamuktaṃ tatra dūṣaṇamiti adoṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamatastayorekataravādinirākaraṇāntā paryavasāna (7)
SA15n1266:46: tathā hi kiṃ pramāṇamupadarśitaṃ bhavediti pramāṇamevāpadarśitaṃ nirdoṣatā visphuraṇāt svasādhanasya paroktāva-(8)
SA15n1266:48: avyavahārapratiṣedhavyavahārakhaṇḍanāpi svavāgbādhitavyavahārapratiṣedhasannidhānāyakā vastudharmmidharmasya ca pramāṇatvāt prativādinaḥ na (9)
SA15n1266:49: ca vyavahāraniṣedhavyavahāraheturapahastito haste’nyastaśca vyavahārapratiṣedhavyavahāra iti hṛdayaṅgamaṃ janaṅgamasyāpi vyāpakānupalambhena vyāpyābhāvavyavahāraṃ vyavahārataḥ sudūramapakṛṣṭaprāmāṇikavyavahārāvaśyamaṅgīkaraṇam |
SA15n1266:52: maśakyaṃ pratyakṣamanumānamiti kiṃ tvayā pratipannaṃ apratipannaṃ vā |
SA15n1266:58: dvitīyastviṣyata iti cāntarbhūtvā bhāsate janaḥ prāmāṇikaśceti avastuni vyavahāra-(4)
SA15n1266:59: -pratiṣedhavyavahārakhaṇḍanā kutaścetibruvantaḥ eva viśiṣṭa viṣayavyavahārapratiṣedhavyavahārakhaṇḍenāśabdenaiva tadviṣayapramāṇāpravṛtyā tadviṣayatvamuktasādhyasya duḥsamādhānam |
SA15n1266:63: ‘kiṃ kumo yatra vacanaṃ sarvathaivetyādi’ yaduktaṃ tadapi svavacanaviruddhamanuruddhamanubaddhaṃ anupravartate |
SA15n1266:66: tathāhi vyāpakānupalambhe punaḥ samutthāpyante prativādinī dūṣaṇā duṣkare'bhāṣaṇabhāvabhājibhūte parāja-(8)
SA15n1266:67: -yabhūmirapratibhābhāvataḥ prabhevabhāsvataḥsādhujananiveśitaṃ sādhanaṃ prasādhanamevodyotayatīti labdha eva kathāvadhiḥ |
SA15n1266:71: yatpunaḥ svabhāṣābhaṅgibhirasaṅgatābhiraṅgīkaroti vyavahāraṃ na coktāvadyaṃ śrutisabhyaḥ praspandaṃ girāmityudbhaṇati |
SA15n1266:74: svavacanaviraudhaviruddhatayaiva nātiprasakto vyavahārapratiṣedhavyavahāraḥ na punaḥ sa tathābhūto mā bhūdityayaṃ vyavahāro'smākamanumataḥ kintarhi tadvyāpakavirahāt vyāpyaviraho vibhāgataḥ pramāṇānugataśca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasvapramāṇasiddhatvāt tadvirahitasya cāvastusato dharmmiṇaḥ pratipannatvāt(2)
SA15n1266:75: asato'tyadhikaraṇādivivakṣārūḍhakārakakalāsaṃkrāntakalevaratvātkathamaparathā sthūlaskhalitasvavacanabādhāvāruddhā vṛthānyāyavinmānino naiyāyikāḥ svavacanabādhehi svavacanaṃpramāṇaṃ bādhakaṃ ḍhaukitam |
SA15n1266:76: ataḥ kathamayamaprāmāṇikaḥ kathita iti ślathaya śūnyagranthigranthanārthitvam |
SA15n1266:77: tathā ca aprāmāṇikaḥ svavacanabādho'bhyupagamyayamānopi tvayā svavāgbādhatvaṃ na jahāti nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti-(4)
SA15n1266:78: -vit yadi tvabhyupagamādevādoṣatvamevamanyatrāpi astu avastuviṣaye'siddhatvamabhyu pagacchāma iti vayamapi vadiṣyāmaḥ utpattyāpi jalpavitaṇḍe'pi kathyata iti tatpakṣāpekṣayā (5)
SA15n1266:86: avastudharmī kutaḥ pramāṇāt prasiddhamiti bruvanneva avastudharminiṣṭhapramāṇapraśnaḥ tadasiddhau pramāṇataḥ (7)
SA15n1266:88: tathāhi viśeṣaviṣayapramāṇapraśnāt viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ tadasiddhau tadviṣayavimarśāyogāt |
SA15n1266:90: -naiva vacasā paramacarodhvamadhurastenaiva svapakṣaṃ kṣiṇotīti kṣīṇaḥ kathaṃjalpavitaṇḍayorapi svavacanavyādhātaḥ |
SA15n1266:93: na bhāṣate cet apratibhāṃ bhūribhūmimābhajatīti kṛtaṃ kāyavratena sabinaiva nyāyena avastvapi dharmisvānurūpadha-(10)
SA15n1266:95: ayaṃ sabhyāḥ tathāhi jīvati śarīre kṣetrajña saṃjñā upameyameyajñāpanāṅga prāmāṇadimatvaṃ nyastam |
SA15n1266:96: kevalavyatirekakīrtitavikramaḥ śrāvaṇatvasamaṃ mābhūditi sapakṣe tara syādeva vyāvṛttamiti varṇanīyatāsapakṣe(2)
SA15n1266:100: kiṃ sadbhāva bhaṃgenāsadbhūte prāṇādimattvasya sapakṣe sadbhāvavipakṣaṃ lakṣayati na cettarhi sadbhāvāsadbhāvaniṣedhavyavahāropi niṣedhavyavahāra eveti nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate |
SA15n1266:103: sa eṣa vyavahāro naiyāyikasya vyatirekihetupratihatipratyūhananidāno dīpyate |
SA15n1266:106: yayā sapakṣo vikṣobhitavipakṣaprasaraḥ prekṣyairūpalakṣyate siddhadharmitayā tadāśritaścāyamavidyamā-(6)
SA15n1266:123: nanu cādhunā pi na dhunāti vākyaṃ svaparaparāmarśasāmyamasapakṣanyāyasya nyāse viśeṣaṇaṃ manasi ha prāptakālamavā(2)
SA15n1266:124: lasya pramāṇavyāpārasparśanena tatra kama bhāṇīt guṇīguṇaḥ bahubādhāvidhopi tarkopaniṣadanavadyavidyācāryakīrti(dharmakīrti)
SA15n1266:126: asti ca abhāvavibhāvanāvibhuḥ prabhutapramāṇavyāpāraḥ pīrasphuṭā pi paṭubhirapi nāraṭitaḥ pratyarthijanābhyarthanayā niḥpramathanaṃ kathyate |
SA15n1266:128: na śakyā eva siddhāste vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ ||
SA15n1266:131: tatparicchinatti tato'nyadvyavacchinatti tṛtīyaprakārābhāvañca sūcayatītyekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣa iti narasiṃha siṃhāsanārūḍha prau-(6)
SA15n1266:133: atra hi prasaṅgaviparyayanirvāheṇa pūrvāparāvasthayorvyavasthāpito vastubhedaḥ sa evānityatā śabdavācyatā (7)
SA15n1266:134: tathā ca svabhāvādavasthyamanityatāṃ vrūma iti vacanam |
SA15n1266:135: sa cāntaraṃ prāgabhāvaṃ pradhvaṃsaṃ ca sāmākhyāto vastubhedaḥ prasiddhyati yena pramāṇena kṣaṇaparyavasānabhajanabhāvena kṣaṇa-(8)
SA15n1266:136: -bhaṅgabhāṣayā bhaṇitaḥ tenaiva tadviparītamapi nityatvamakṣaṇikatvaṃ ca siddhipaddhatimadhyārūḍhaṃ jāyate |
SA15n1266:138: -tve tataḥ pṛthagavasthānavyavasthānamamunaiva pramāṇena paricchindatā tṛtīyaprakārāpakāraśca kalitaḥ |
SA15n1266:145: tathā sarva hi pradeśamarthāntaraṃ adhvānaviviktamupalabdhavataḥ sa yena yena asāreṇa tadasāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī smṛtirūtpannā pratyakṣabalenetyā-(3)
SA15n1266:146: -dinā tatra tatra saśūnyaṃ vacaḥ tadihāpi nityatvamanityatāgrāhipramāṇena svapremayādvahirbhāvabhāgismaraṇajanadvāreṇa ātmavyāpāraṃ vyavahāratathatā'vatāritaniścayaṃ vipaścitaḥ pa-(4)
SA15n1266:147: ritaḥ paritoṣayato yathā salilaṃ salilajasya nidānamadīnamānasena pramāṇasanāthena sthāpayitvā salilasarojabījasvabhāvamabibhrato'bhūto na bhrājate bhāvato bhāvo bārijanye (5)
SA15n1266:148: -ti kāraṇābhāvena kāryamasaditi pratipipādayiṣā paravaśasyākāśadeśe pi ya śabdaprayogo rogamiva bhāvamaspṛśan abhāvābhidhāyī nāśaṅakya eva sadbhāvavibhāvakṛt-(6)
SA15n1266:151: -tanītinimnenāmnoto yenaiva mānena manasvinā satā tenaiva bandhyāsūnuśabdo viniveśitaḥ nāśaṃkā taṅkena tarkate bhāvacanopamiti balābalambīvyavahā-(8)
SA15n1266:152: -ro'mbudasaṃvṛtadigantare vā pi pramāṇayitavyo nāmānyathā prasthānaṃ paripanthividhirūpeṇa tu pramāṇapraṇayānusaraṇakāraṇako'yamakāṇḍacaṇḍaḥ kolāhalo (9)
SA15n1266:155: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayaṃ tenāśrayāsiddhatā,
SA15n1266:156: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ svapakṣo'pi ca |
SA15n1266:157: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā (10)
SA15n1266:178: yadi ca vyāvahārasvīkāre virodho parihāraḥ syāt (asau svīkriyetāpi, na tvevam)
SA15n1266:179: , na khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanañca tanniṣedhavyavahārabhājanañceti vacanaṃ parasparamavirodhīti,
SA15n1266:181: abhāvo hi dharmī svānurūpapramāṇavyāpārānusārī syātte pratyayapratiṣṭhāpitaḥ svasminnasaṃbhāvinā ca bhāvadharmeṇa vimuhyamāno vyāpakānupalambhena sambhā-(8) vitaḥ |
SA15n1266:182: tatkimucyate na khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanañcetyādi avastuno'vastusamucitadharmavidhivyavahāragocaratayāpīṣyata eveti nābhyupagaṇa eva do-(9)
SA15n1266:192: pāraparicayādyathā paryanvasitaṃ tathā sthāpitameva prāgiti susthatā bhāvataiva stheyā |
SA15n1266:194: -tkaḥ sarvasmai svadate nirvyūḍhaśca yaḥ punarvikalpamātramādāya asatkhyātiranyathākhyāti ritivā vicāraprakrama vaso'pi na prakṛtānurūpaḥ niyatānubhavo hi vika-(4)
SA15n1266:200: na ca tāvataiva vāsanāta eva nikhilalīlādijananamastviti svasthaṃ manaso vacanamucitam,
SA15n1266:205: -manalasāḥ paśyantaḥ śabdayoniḥ vikalpo vikalpayoniśca śabda iti saṃketavyavahārakālamilitānāvilavikalpajāladurjaṭitavidhipratiṣedhavaddhacakṣubandhutvā(8)
SA15n1266:207: tvānusāriṇaḥ sarve parinirvṛtāḥ kimaparaṃ parāmarśaprasaraste taniṣyati |
SA15n1266:208: eka pratyavamarśākhye jñāne ekatra hi sthitaḥ ||
SA15n1266:233: yathā saṃsāraḥ tathā na tadabhāvalakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ praṇidhātā sātānubhavanabhavanamiti bhavyavyavahāriṇāṃ pa-(6)
SA15n1266:241: na cānyasya svabhāve ghaṭavat ghaṭābhāvasyāpi prāmāṇikatvānabhyupagame svabhāvādanavakāśāt pramāṇasiddhevahi (9)
SA15n1266:242: svābhāvāvalambanaṃ na tu svabhāvavādāvalambane naiva vastusthitiriti bhavatāmevāyaṃ tatra tatra jayadundubhiriti tadapi bhagnagrahavādimukhasukhavādanaṃ bhavato na te svabhāvālambanamavalambanavāsināpyetatkṛtam ghaṭaḥ paricchetavyo na vā ādye sāvadharaṇo'nyathā vā,
SA15n1266:243: ghaṭa evāyaṃ nānyathā sthāpanīya iti cetparicchedaḥ tarhi karṣita eva pramāṇadvayāvegaḥ (2)
SA15n1266:244: atha na tathā tathāpi ghaṭaḥ paricchinno paṭa iti tadarthī nopasarpyedantikamasya na kim |
SA15n1266:245: taduktaṃ na hyayamanalaṃ paśyan analameva paśyati |
SA15n1266:246: iti kathaṃ yena salilārthī tatra na pravartete tyādi |
SA15n1266:258: ghaṭavadabhāve'pi svena rūpeṇa vidhirnāstīti bhaṇito nābhāvaḥ syādapi tu parasparābhāvavān |
SA15n1266:263: yādṛśastu parasparapratiṣedhasvabhāvastādṛśo bhāvagrāhiṇaiṣa bhāvaṃ niyamavantaṃ bhāvayatā (7)
SA15n1266:264: pratīta eveti kimatra chadmaneti bhaṇāmaḥ kalpanānirṇītameva trairūpyamityapi pāpīyaḥ vyāptyādau tṛtīyaprakārābhāvavirodhasādhakaprasaṅgādeḥ pramāṇasya praṇītatvāt |
SA15n1266:273: tadevaṃ kramayaugapadyābhāva eva bādhakaṃ pramāṇamupadarśitam vināśasya svaparahetutvaṃ parikarabandha eva aitenaitadapinirākṛtam |
SA15n1266:275: tarhi dhruvabhāgitvena vināśasyāhetu katvasiddhekṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ na vikalpānupapatreḥ |
SA15n1266:277: nirupākhyatvaṃ vā tatkāryatvaṃ vā abhāvatvameveti vā sthitā vikalpā niṣedhyaniṣedhakayorekatvānupapatteḥ |
SA15n1266:281: nāstitā sā ca kālāntare samarthetaratvabhāvatvameveti cet-nanvayameva kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ tathā cāsiddhamevāsiddhena sādhayataḥ kaste pratimallaḥ |
SA15n1266:282: api ca deśā-(4)-ntarakālāntarānuṣaṅgiṇyasya nāstitā yadyayameva nūnamanakṣaramidamuktam,
SA15n1266:286: aśakteḥ kathamastu śakteḥ sattālakṣaṇatvāditi cet-atha ki kālāntarakāryaṃ prati svakāle'śaktirasattvam |
SA15n1266:292: na hi rāsabhāpekṣayā dhūmo jagati nāstīti tatkasya hetoḥ |
SA15n1266:294: dvitīye tu kālāntarādhārā śaktiḥ vā nā'śaktiḥ (8)
SA15n1266:305: sa hi bhāvo'bhāvovā śabdārthaḥ puruṣārthaṃ yadi kiñciduparuṇaddhi samādadhāti vā yathābhini-(2)
SA15n1266:307: tadā tadātvasamīhitasampādanāhetutāsabhyūhe samīhamānaḥ samānaḥ tadvastvadhiṣṭhānīkaroti vitānacakracalanapariśramasya |
SA15n1266:309: pratibaddha iti tataḥ prastute'pi vastunisvahastasthāpitaṃ nyāyī vihasto vahistokagopālāditaḥ |
SA15n1266:311: svahetuta eva te nimīlitavinaśvarasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ pratiniyatakālāyogaphalitaḥ prathamavaṃśaprabhavaprabhāvavanmudgaraguruprahārānehasi ghaṭakoṭiśakapālapatalamapahāya vilocanavicayenāpi (5)
SA15n1266:316: tenā'bhāva iti śrutiḥ kva nihitā kiṃ vātra tatkāraṇam,
SA15n1266:319: -paraṃ parāmṛśya niṣedhyamapi avyavasāya ghaṭapaṭaparṇavākhyamaparatvena vyavatiṣṭhamānamāha niṣedhyaniṣedhakayorekatvānupapatteriti |
SA15n1266:321: pālavalayavyatirekiṇi vināśakahetuprahatajanmani niṣedhakatvasupathaṃ tena vā vighaṭanaṃ ghaṭa-paṭa parṇavāde.........pratyakṣīkāritaṃ yena tanniṣedhyaṃ tataśca bhedopa-(9)
SA15n1266:329: iti nyāyena svahetoḥ svarūpameva hi parasmāḥ danyarūpamutpattimāsannaṃ ātmānurūpapratibhāsamutpāditasvaparaviṣayaviṣayavidhipratiṣedhasmārtavikalpadvayadarśitavaśaṃ dala-(3)
SA15n1266:334: -saṃsargasaṃsargaḥ svargārgalagovargādikavastusvanidānadattadaśāvadhivibhratāvadhibhāvasvabhāvasambandhaṃ viparītāsamvandhabhārabhuvaṃbhavantaṃ hanta tadā kā te hāniḥ (6)
SA15n1266:339: vacanāt ghañ kṛtvāha tat hetvantarau jananahetusamutpattitaḥ vinaśvaratvaḥ padārthaḥ prajñapyate |
SA15n1266:341: na bhāvo bhavatītyuktamabhāvo bhavatītyapītyādinā kriyāpratiṣedhamātraṃ kriyā iti tathaiva pramāṇa pravṛtteḥ |
SA15n1266:345: -kriyā ityavocadvācaspati sa evānarthanyāyasya nyāyasya vyākhyātā ākhyātavyaḥ kimīdṛśamākhyā tava āsīt |
SA15n1266:346: dhvaṃso vastuvidherbalāt parighavat yadvā yathā śarkarā,
SA15n1266:347: bhāvo'sau tadavastha eva tu na yatkiñcitkarāstasya te ||
SA15n1266:352: tpāde nāśa parampareti vibhavedbhāvaḥ kadācinna saḥ |
SA15n1266:356: ‘yadi ca tasminsamati vastvadarśanāt dhvaṃsākhya vastunibṛttirucyate, tadā-
SA15n1266:358: eva vastu śakalānyevāthaveti mitrapādairuktaṃ prasaṅgataḥ vyavahartavyarupāyāstu nivṛtterdeśakālākārādhārā ca vāriṇānurodho vyavahāraka pratiniya-(5)
SA15n1266:359: tapratibhāsatadviviktārthāntaradarśanākhyānupalambhanaprabhava vikalpātalpaśāyitayā tena tucchasya kīdṛśaṃ janmetyādi galapallavaprayāsaḥ phale phala (6) ruhetaḥ |
SA15n1266:361: bhūyo'rthasya virudhyate na tu janistasyeti ki hetunā |
SA15n1266:364: tasmādyo ho samagrātmā hetuḥ sa svakāryamupārjayan naśvarabhāvālaṅkṛtamupārjayati niyatānehaskamasya punarapara(4)
SA15n1266:367: tameva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayedyadi kiṃ bhavet ||
SA15n1266:369: bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto'bhāve bhāvastathā katham ||
SA15n1266:370: tena ‘yasyā sāmagrayā yatkāryaṃ tattadariktānapekṣamiti sādhanārthaḥ tadirma ko nāma nānumanuta kārya mevatu vināśa iti |
